dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.ecuresource

Class DefaultEcuResourceFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
      • dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.ecuresource.DefaultEcuResourceFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEcuResourceFinder, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension

    public final class DefaultEcuResourceFinder
extends dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
implements IEcuResourceFinder
    Default implementation of IEcuResourceFinder. This ResourceFinder takes the first resource that matches target and derivate if the extension via which this finder is registered has no parameters.

    The searching can be tuned by setting an arbitrary number of name and path parameter pairs:

    • name<suffix>: Determines the parameter of the ecuresource extension that is matched against a configuration variable.
    • path<suffix>: Gives a schema path via which the variable in the configuration project is searched that is matched against a parameter in the ecu resource extension-point.

    ecuresourcefinder extension (extension point dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.plugin.ecuresourcefinder):

     <ecuresourcefinder>
  <finder class="dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.ecuresource.DefaultEcuResourceFinder">
    <parameter name="name" value="subderivate"/>
    <parameter name="path" value="..../Base/GeneralSettings/SubDerivate"/>
    <parameter name="name2" value="version"/>
    <parameter name="path2" value="..../Base/CommonPublishedInformation/ArMajorVersion"/>
  </finder>
 </ecuresourcefinder>

    ecuresource extension (extension point dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.plugin.ecuresource):

     <ecuresource
    target="V850"
    derivate="V850EGP1"
    file="resources/V850_V850EGP1.properties">
  <parameter name="subderivate" value="ERAY"/>
  <parameter name="version" value="2"/>
 </ecuresource><br/>

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.a

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PARAM_NAME
      This parameter to the ecuresourcefinder extension-point determines the parameter of the ecuresource extension-point that is matched against configuration variable matching the schemaPath set via the PARAM_PATH parameter
      static java.lang.String PARAM_PATH
      This parameter if set in the ecuresourcefinder extension-point gives a path into the schema via which a configuration node is searched that contains a value that must match a parameter of a register resource which is selected by the PARAM_NAME parameter to the ecuresourcefinder extension-point.

      • findProperties

        public EcuResourceProperties findProperties(DCtxt ctxt,
                                            EcuResourceProperties[] resourceProperties)
        Returns the first matching element of the given resource properties array or null.
        Specified by:
        findProperties in interface IEcuResourceFinder
        Parameters:
        ctxt - Data model context
        resourceProperties - Array of EcuResourceProperties filtered by target and derivate.
        Returns:
        Returns the first matching element of the given resource properties array or null if no matching resource properties can be found.
        Since:
        2008.a
